title: Manthan Academy Coaching Institute Website

requirements.text: Create a simple, educational, professional marketing website for the coaching institute “Manthan Academy” with clear branding and content in English.

quotes: Create a website for a coaching institute named Manthan Academy... Make the website simple, educational and professional.

acceptanceCriteria: The site name “Manthan Academy” is prominently visible in the header and main hero section.
All user-facing text is in English.
The design feels educational and professional (no flashy animations required).

requirements.text: Implement a coherent visual theme and UI system (colors, typography, spacing, components) suitable for an educational institute, and apply it consistently across all pages.

quotes: Make the website simple, educational and professional.

acceptanceCriteria: A consistent color palette and typography are used across the entire site (avoid blue/purple as the primary theme).
Components (buttons, cards, headings, sections) look uniform across pages.
Layout is responsive and readable on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

requirements.text: Add a top navigation header and footer with working internal links for: Home, About Teacher, Courses, and Contact.

quotes: Create a website for a coaching institute named Manthan Academy.

acceptanceCriteria: Header navigation is visible on all pages and highlights the current page/state.
Footer appears on all pages and includes institute name and basic quick links.
All navigation links work without full page reload issues.

requirements.text: Create a Home page that introduces Manthan Academy and the main offerings (CBSE support, Spoken English, English Grammar) with a professional hero section and concise call-to-action to contact.

quotes: I teach CBSE students, English spoken, English grammer etc.

acceptanceCriteria: Home page includes a hero section with “Manthan Academy” and a short tagline/intro.
Home page lists the three main offerings: CBSE students, Spoken English, English Grammar.
A primary call-to-action leads users to the Contact section/page.

requirements.text: Create an About Teacher page featuring the teacher profile: name “Digvijay Karn”, role as teacher at Manthan Academy, and a short professional bio focused on teaching CBSE and English (spoken + grammar).

quotes: I am the teacher at Manthan Academy, my name is Digvijay Karn. I teach CBSE students, English spoken, English grammer etc.

acceptanceCriteria: The page includes the name “Digvijay Karn” and clearly identifies him as the teacher at Manthan Academy.
Bio content is concise, professional, and education-focused.
A section summarizes teaching focus areas (CBSE, Spoken English, English Grammar).

requirements.text: Create a Courses page that clearly presents course categories (CBSE Support, Spoken English, English Grammar) with brief descriptions and a simple structure (cards/sections).

quotes: I teach CBSE students, English spoken, English grammer etc.

acceptanceCriteria: Each course category appears as a distinct section/card with a short description.
Page is scannable and consistent with the site theme.
Each course section includes a clear prompt to contact/enroll (linking to Contact).

requirements.text: Create a Contact page with a simple contact section and a basic contact form that works without external services (e.g., mailto link or on-screen message), including placeholders for phone/email/address if not provided.

quotes: Create a website for a coaching institute named Manthan Academy.

acceptanceCriteria: The page includes contact details placeholders (Phone, Email, Address) that can be easily edited later.
A contact form is present with fields like Name, Phone/Email, Message.
Submitting the form provides a clear outcome without requiring third-party integrations (e.g., opens mail client via mailto or shows a confirmation message).

requirements.text: Add required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and display them in the UI (logo in header/footer; hero visual on Home/About).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
The logo is displayed in the header and footer.
The hero image is displayed on the Home page (and optionally reused on About) with proper responsive sizing and alt text.

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed by the system context; compose those components instead.
Do not introduce external databases or third-party auth; keep the site primarily informational.
nonGoals: Real-time chat, messaging, or push notifications.
Third-party email services or CRM integrations.

required: Minimal academic logo mark with book + pen motif, clean vector-like style, transparent background (manthan-academy-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide classroom/learning themed hero illustration, modern flat style, warm neutral palette (manthan-hero-illustration.dim_1600x700.png)
